resources.string: Welcome to the Cellwar game tutorial.
On the game screen there are 3 types of cells: yours (yellow), computer\'s (red) and nobody\'s (gray).

Number on each cell means counter of troops inside that cell. Each cell produces troops until their number will reach max possible value. Bigger cells can produce more troops and make them faster than smaller cell.

You can click on your cell to select it or deselect. Then you click \'Transport\' on the screen and afterwards you can click and hold to transport troops to another cell. You will take over computer or nobody cell if the number of sent troops is greater than the number of troops inside cell.
You aim is to take over all computer\'s cells.
This application has been developed as a miniproject for course named Simulations. Our task was to do a reverse engineering of a game called Nanowar.
Artur Hebda & Kamil Wajda - students of the AGH University of Science and Technology in Cracow, Poland
